meanings.sent1: The room was ceilinged, keeping the rain out.
meanings.sent2: The ceilinged house felt cozy and safe.
meanings.sent3: The ceilinged tent kept the campers dry during the storm.
meanings.sent4: The ceilinged sky seemed to protect the earth below.
meanings.sent5: The ceilinged cave provided shelter from the elements.

meanings.definition: Having a specified type or number of ceilings.
meanings.sent1: The double-ceilinged room looked grand and spacious.
meanings.sent2: The high-ceilinged hall echoed with every step.
meanings.sent3: The uniquely ceilinged building puzzled the architects.
meanings.sent4: The multi-ceilinged structure was a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent5: The low-ceilinged basement felt cramped and stuffy.
